Locale.Value:
- The number of words written today can be displayed at the bottom of the editor
- The word count of the document can be displayed behind the title of the document in the directory tree on the left
- Added group management to the card list
- The highlight color of the card list can be customized
- Cards in the whiteboard can be moved to other whiteboards
- Fixed the problem that the author name and cover image were not remembered when exporting Epub
- Adjust the logic of writing time statistics
- Some detail improvements and minor bug fixes

- 可在编辑器底部显示今日码字数
- 可在左侧目录树文档标题后方显示文档字数
- 卡片列表新增分组管理
- 卡片列表可自定义高亮颜色
- 白板中的卡片可以移动到其他白板
- 修复 Epub 导出时没有记住作者名和封面图片的问题
- 调整码字时间统计逻辑
- 一些细节改进以及小问题修复
- 不再支持 Windows 7
